name: Cinnamon Swirl Chocolate Chip Bread
author: My Hot Southern Mess
summary: A delicious cinnamon swirl quick bread that is sprinkled with chocolate chips.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl
Combine sugar, brown sugar, and oil in a separate bowl
Stir in buttermilk, egg, and vanilla extract
Add to flour mixture and mix until combined
Spoon 1/2 of the batter into the prepared loaf pan
Combine brown sugar and cinnamon for the topping in a small bowl
Sprinkle all but 2 tablespoons topping into the loaf pan and cover with the remaining batter
Gently drag a knife through the batter to create a swirl
Sprinkle the remaining topping on top of the loaf
Bake in a preheated oven until a toothpick inserted comes out clean, 50 to 60 minutes
Remove and let cool for 15 minutes
Remove from the pan to a wire rack to cool completely
